name: Kill the bug!
description:
Everyone
Believes themselves
They are the BEST BUG KILLER

IN THE WHOLE WORLD

Are you ready to be the This Game Champion?
Shoot the paper ball and hunt the bug!
It`s HARDER than you think

This is sometimes use Genius Brain
And sometimes use Best Game Physical

Are you ready for play awesome game?

*******Game Feature*******

> Simply drag to shoot the fire ball
> Hundreds of stage to play
> Supports iPhoneX, iPad series
> Best indie game developer we`re MondayOFF!
